_object.description: String representing the object's type. Always /product for this object.

country_of_origin.description: Nation in which the product is manufactured

client_verified.description: Indicates whether Client has verified this Product.

product_properties.description: An array of product properties, represented by ProductProperty

hs_codes.description: DEPRECATED - HS codes can be found in the classifications array

classifications.description: An array of product classifications, represented by Classification

archived_at.description: A date string representing when the product was archived. Will be null if product is not archived. In ISO8601 UTC format with timezone denoted by Z.
